column2:

Press Jump to proceed.

Press Interact to rebind controls, or Jump to proceed.
(arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to interact, and Enter to pause by default)
Press your UP key
Press your DOWN key
Press your LEFT key
Press your RIGHT key
Press your JUMP key
Press your INTERACT key
Press your PAUSE key

Left/Right to change Text Scroll Speed. 0 is instant.
Press Jump to proceed.
She/Her
Doe/Doe
You wake slowly, the ambience of the sea coming into focus. You feel somewhat sore all over, although it gradually fades.
Sand covers much of your front, unpleasant grit embedding itself into your skin.
After a moment to sit up, you look over yourself.

Your enormous belly heaves out significantly in front of you, spilling over most of your lap. It's topped with breasts that might inspire jealousy in skinny folk if the rest of your fat were out of sight.
Hoof-tipped arms droop halfway down your torso while holding them straight, though you rarely ever do that. They're profoundly soft and wobbly, a point of pride for your figure.
Your legs are dimpled, doughy columns that jiggle profusely with most movement, far past wide enough to force a waddle.
In other words, all seems normal about your exterior.
A beat after your self-examination, you hear something breach the surface of the water behind you, and turn to face it.
A somewhat fat, feminine shark walks up to you. You arduously stand up.
Are you okay?
I thought I heard something up here, but it's hard to tell underwater. Glad I checked.
She wears a friendly grin tinged with concern. Her voice is deep, smooth. It's soothing.
I seem to be alright...
Who are you?
I'm Siblif. I live underwater, not far from this island.
I was just out for a swim, actually! I don't think I'd have heard anything if I was back home.
Anyway- what's your name, tubby?
Your face gets a little warm at that.
My name is Kiwi. I don't know how I ended up here.
Good to meet you, then. You look nice and heavy!
Siblif briefly glances around, then back to you. Her smile looks a bit more artificial; she speaks with a chuckle.
...How well can you swim?
You stare blankly at her.
She returns your gaze, faltering smile betraying amused pity.
Thought so.
Well, look, I'll cut you a deal: I worked up an appetite on my travels and I'm feeling pretty tired, so I'm gonna stay here.
My friends tell me the fruits and vegetables that grow here are great, but I've never gotten around to trying it. How about you go find us some while I set up a place to stay for tonight?
Then tomorrow - or maybe a little longer if it tastes really good - I can help you get back to wherever you live. Sound good?
She's positively beaming, transparently mischievous.
Alright, sounds great! Glad you're on board.
There are a few different biomes around here, each with different plants. I'm happy to eat any of them, so you take your pick and head off when you're ready.
There's a cave nearby, apparently plant life flourishes down there. Bit dangerous, though.
The jungle speaks for itself. I hear it can be hard to find some of the plants, but I'm sure you can manage.
Finally, there are some delicate ingredients up on the mountain. That might take more dexterity than you can offer, but you're welcome to try.
Do whatever you need!
localState++
Sure! I'm getting hungry too.
I guess so...?
You look at her incredulously.
What do you mean "a deal"?
I'll try searching the cave, then.
localState++
I'll survey the jungle, I suppose.
localState++
I'll climb the mountain for a while I guess.
localState++
Would you like to return to Siblif?
room_goto
You cautiously flip open the newly-pitched tent's door flap, uncertain how the inside will look.
A lit oil lamp sits on a tiny table, emitting a stark orange glow across the decidedly opaque tent fabric. It's a warm, inviting light.
Below, two camping mats lay parallel just a few decimeters apart, thankfully both very wide. They look comfy enough, and are headed by big, fluffy pillows.
Elsewhere on the ground you even spot some shallow bowls & eating utensils atop a few cloths! Quite fully featured.
localState++
Siblif stands, staring at you, pleased. Just as before, her breasts, tummy and butt are on full display, all quite bulbous and soft.
Pretty as she looks, the two of you need to eat.
localState++
Hey, Siblif, I picked some stuff up. More than I expected, actually!
You show the hungry shark your spoils. She looks delighted!
Ooh, you got so much! I can't wait~
Her stomach gurgles loudly. Ravenously. Siblif's expression doesn't change, clearly happy to have her tummy share its anticipation for the meal.
Hey, Siblif, I grabbed a few things.
You show the doughy shark your ingredients. She grins.
That looks great!
Well, I got a couple things...
You show the poor shark your pitiful haul. She frowns at it.
I doubt that could feed a starving kid, Kiwi. Did you eat most of the food yourself?
Whatever. Cook what you can first, then come back to me. I don't want to eat raw ingredients.
But, you have to cook it first! I don't want raw ingredients.
Right...
I guess you're pretty tired after setting all this up, then.
You're exhausted yourself, but whatever - you're a people-pleaser, so you silently comply with her questionable demand.
Good job, by the way! I didn't know what to expect, but this is a lot.
Oh, thank you. It was hard work, and now I'm starving. My meal can be your 'thanks'.
In spite of the somewhat dismissive response, her expression conveys sincere gratitude.
You pick up the bowls and utensils and leave the tent, ready to cook food for the evening.
localState++
Once the food is all cooked, you bring it to Siblif, eagerly waiting to eat.
You don't take a lot of time to admire the tent she set up, but you are impressed!
Smells great! Worth the wait, eh?
You give a short, bewildered chuckle.
Are you sure you even smelled it yet?
Oh, of course I have. Whatever - it'll be great! My friends love this stuff.
We will too.
At that, she dons a gentle, earnest smile.
She's a little rough on you, but she clearly values this a fair bit.
You can't help grinning. Maybe you do, too.
localState++
The two of you ate your food, mostly silent and sleepy.
You were both too exhausted to talk much, and so extinguished the lamp and went to bed soon after the meal.
All things considered, it turned out to be an unexpectedly pleasant experience.
After several minutes, she abruptly, softly speaks.
Thank you, Kiwi.
Thank you, too, Siblif. This was nice.
She says no more, your perpetually roiling tummies the only sound remaining. You drift to sleep in the soothing ambience of digestion.
You choose to stay silent, pretending to be asleep.
Truthfully, you're not quite sure how you feel.
Waking up in a new place, working hard all day... It's a lot.
Tomorrow will be worth it. You're sure of it.
localState++
Kiwi!!
You're startled awake, Siblif's squeezy hands sinking deep into your pillow-sized arm and jiggling it the best she can manage.
She releases once you stir, backing off a bit as if to show herself off.
localState++
...Woah. I didn't think I made enough food to do that.
Yeah, me neither!
I just woke up and noticed my belly was softer! And spills out further! Weird!
It's also... extra rumbly.
Or maybe I'm just that hungry~
Anyway, that's about as much as I usually eat, so I dunno what happened!
That was pretty average for me too, now that you mention it.
Although, I'm a lot fatter than you are.
Don't brag...
You know, maybe we should try some more food here? To see if it's a fluke or not.
Uh... I guess?
I doubt I need to get home all that urgently. Not that I remember, really.
Great! Well I'm just starving by now - you've been asleep forever, by the way - so I'm in no shape to gather food.
Plus, burning so many calories would compromise the results!
That's why you haven't gained anything, obviously.
I don't think that amount of weight is as noticeable on me, Siblif, I very well could've gained it too.
Well, you can't really test two factors at once like that, so we can't know which of those is the true culprit.
But with me, we're only testing one! Simple.
She seems eager to gain weight! That's exciting...
Your own colossal bulk is due to a similar enthusiasm, so you're all too happy to see someone else plump up.
Even happier to help the person in question, using food that's unnaturally fattening! If that's what this truly was.
And judging by her weird excuses and manic energy... maybe she's just as, if not more, into weight gain as you are.
...Okay. Sure, I'll get some more food.
She's visibly delighted by that.
...Yeah, there's no way she's just curious.
That's a topic you'll need to broach later.
And remember to cook it first!
You nod, a strange smirk creeping onto your snout.
Right. We'll eat soon, Siblif.
localState++
...Woah. I didn't think I made enough food to do that.
Yeah, me neither!
I just woke up and noticed my butt was softer! And thighs wider! Weird!
Makes for a lovely seat~
...Woah. I didn't think I made enough food to do that.
Yeah, me neither!
I just woke up and noticed some... extra weight on my chest!
And they were pretty heavy already... Weird!
Where will you go?
room_goto
room_goto
room_goto
Once the food is all cooked, you bring it to Siblif, eagerly waiting to eat.
Problem is...
Uh... I didn't get anything.
She merely stares for a few beats.
What?
I just... didn't.
Did you not find anything?
No, I did, I just didn't grab any of it.
Why?
You stare to the floor.
I wanted to see how you'd react...
... Okay...
Then go out and get some food for real?
What else are we going to eat?
Alright.
Sorry.
Hey, silly - play the game this time!
Here's some motivation if you need it: Siblif mentioned her friends loving the food on this island. They did, and they all got utterly MASSIVE off of it. She is well aware of the cause.
Bye! Do better next time!
localState++
Alright, game's crashing now. Actually play it next time!!!
I'm a hungry girl, and yesterday wasn't enough food.
So, I was thinking... how about we delay our plans a bit so we can eat some more?
You're barely awake, but do your best to process her words.
Ah... sure?
Lovely!
Head off when you're ready, then.
I'll stay here, since I'm so hungry. Can't go wandering on an empty stomach...
My stomach is empty too...
Yeah, well.
Uh.
She nods slowly.
Yeah.
You ready?
Why are you so dead set on eating here? We already did.
Besides, you clearly know the spot - why not just come back?
She audibly exhales.
Truthfully, my friends all say it has interesting effects on them.
The reason I was out for a swim was...
Was to come here and eat the island's food.
It's something I had to plan for a while, and I can't just do it in a day or two. It's important to me that I commit to it now.
I see.
Thank you for being so straightforward with me. I appreciate the honesty.
What exactly are the effects?
She glances away for just a moment.
Uh... You'll see.
That's a little worrying...
No! No, it's a good thing.
I think it'll only affect me anyway, so you have nothing to worry about.
That's enough of that for now.
How exactly do I get home once you're ready to leave?
You said you'd help, but how?
Oh, right - I'll head back to my home and ask a sailor to haul you away.
I know a few! It'll be easy.
I could even come along if it makes you more comfortable~
Hm, okay. We'll see.
Where did all this stuff come from?
You gesture towards the tent, sleeping mats, outside...
Right - I have it all stashed here in case I want to spend a night or two out.
So I just grabbed it from my hiding place earlier today and set it up.
I never know if I'll have a friend along or not, so I keep a few spare 'beds.'
Hm. I guess that makes sense.
Oh, do you need something?
Sorry Kiwi, too hungry to talk right now!
I want to eat as soon as possible, don't waste your time!
She's just standing there.
Oh, alright. I'll talk to you after I cook!
localState++
You waddle into the tent once more, food in hoof.
It's done?
She immediately perks up as you enter.
Yeah! I cooked more this time, hopefully it's enough for you.
Siblif smirks as she takes her serving.
We'll see.
It isn't too long before you both finish eating. You ate at a relaxed pace, the shark not so much.
And it shows on her. While her tummy wasn't remotely flat before, it is noticeably stuffed now.
She's even short of breath, softly panting in the aftermath of her feast.
Not used to eating so much?
No, not really.
I was just very hungry! And now very full.
She gives her taut belly a gentle slap, sending a subtle ripple through her fat. Her heavy breathing persists.
Your face heats up at the unexpected gesture, and hers is similarly tinted pink.
Perhaps Siblif's blush is a mere side effect of her strained stomach?
You think for a moment.
Do you feel sleepy?
...Yeah.
Why?
I just figured we should talk. We haven't done a lot of that.
That's okay, though. We can chat tomorrow morning instead.
You watch her slump down under her blanket, tucking her engorged belly under it.
The cover only makes it slightly less visible, rising and falling in steady rhythm.
Okay. Good night, Kiwi.
Good night, Siblif.
localState++
You were sleepier yesterday evening, probably because of whatever caused your unconsciousness. Likely a sign that you really are okay.
In any case, you're tired enough.
You get cozy under your own blanket, and shove your hooves into your plush flab.
Squishing your belly, kneading your arms, wobbling your butt... Admiring all your heft.
It's delightful stuff to play with, and before you know it you're involuntarily drifting off.
localState++
You waddle into the tent once more, food in hooves.
It's done?
Siblif immediately perks up as you enter.
Yeah! It's not a lot again, sorry. I hope it's enough.
Oh. We'll see.
She has a mild smirk, a little disappointed but not dishonest.
The shark takes her serving and sits on her camping mat, bowl placed on her lap and smooshed against her squishy tummy.
She eats eagerly and rather swiftly, enjoying the meal once again despite it perhaps being too small.
You're slower about the process, ultimately finding the food just decent.
That was good!
You finish chewing a mouthful of your own.
Oh, you're done already?
Yes! It was... filling enough. Little early though, I'll be hungry in the morning for sure.
Alright.
If I'm gonna gather more food, I'd like to talk to you more first, if that's alright.
Sure. But not tonight! I'm feeling tired already.
She gives an unconvincing yawn.
Are you sure you're tired?
Oh, absolutely.
I was pretty busy while you were waddling around, blubberbutt.
Her tone makes it apparent that she knows her yawn wasn't convincing.
Is it related to the food?
The bluntness gives her pause.
Yeah.
Well, kind of.
I just want it to be tomorrow already, to see if anything happens.
I see.
Good night, then, Siblif.
She slumps into her blanket, and you follow suit.
Good night.
localState++
Here's your next feast, Siblif.
You carry the bowls in, steaming contents filling the vessels heartily.
Wonderful! Been waiting all day for this.
Her devious smile suggests some sort of edge to her words, but she's void of sharpness.
I don't doubt it.
Eat up, big girl.
She's caught off guard and says nothing. A prominent blush forms on her pudgy cheek, and her smirk softens a touch.
The two of you proceed to start eating, but... you aren't content to stay silent.
Siblif - I'd like to ask a few things, if that's okay.
The girl is a tad hesitant, but nods before responding:
Sure, okay. What're you wondering?
Where did all this stuff come from?
You gesture towards the tent, sleeping mats, outside...
Right - I have it all stashed here in case I want to spend a night or two out.
So I just grabbed it from my hiding place earlier today and set it up.
I never know if I'll have a friend along or not, so I keep a few spare 'beds.'
Hm. I guess that makes sense.
So you've been to this island before?
Yeah, a couple of my friends went together, and that's when they found out what the food does.
I was surprised how fat they were when they got home!
I tagged along a few times after, but I never ate anything myself.
Each time we came back they got bigger and slower, so I had to do a lot of the work.
At one point I even had to help lift one of the fatties off the ground! It was tough - my hands sunk deep into her blubber, couldn't get a good grip.
And wow, she was heavy! Even as she did her best to lift off the ground, I could barely manage to hold her!
Her blush redoubles while recounting this particular incident.
She was even bigger than you! But not by a lot.
Honestly, I'm impressed that you aren't slower at that size.
You are just MASSIVE.
You blush a fair bit as Siblif seems to realize she'd made a mistake.
That was mean, I shouldn't have said that.
What was mean about that?
You know why it could be offensive, of course, but you like challenging the notion that calling someone fat ought to have negative connotations.
People don't...
You know why. Why are you asking this?
I like fat. It's an amazing thing, and in a variety of aesthetic ways I prefer fat people to skinny ones.
Also physical ways. Fat feels very nice on my hooves...
Obviously you like it too. You aren't subtle, nor do I think you're really trying to be.
So. You want to gain weight?
Yes.
Her voice is uncharacteristically quiet.
Emotional, but not negatively.
How big do you want to get?
I don't know. I'll stop when I feel ready.
I can see myself getting fatter than you.
Her voice raises with each subsequent sentence, regaining confidence.
I was planning on getting a sailor I know to haul your fat butt off the island...
But I'm here to get fat. VERY fat. I already had my own escape plan, it's just a little further out.
How about we wait for that, and in the meantime I gain enough weight to earn the same whale treatment as you?
You smile wide, genuinely glad that you helped Siblif overcome whatever reservations she had about your presence.
That sounds great.
I'll do my best to fatten you up.
Stand up, Kiwi.
Huh? We haven't finished eating-
Just stand.
The shark rises much easier than you, making her way to your front by the time you're up.
She suddenly wraps her arms around you, smushing her chubby body into yours.
Just about every part of her sinks into your copiously doughy form to one extent or another. The one exception is her breasts, which are actually around the same size as yours.
You're a little caught off guard at the gesture, but reciprocate after a few seconds. Your arms drape over much of her back, softly wobbling against her skin.
Thank you, Kiwi.
I thought this trip was going to be ruined for me.
She gets a little grabby, squeezing her hands into your abundant, pliable butt.
...Fuck, you're soft. We need to do this more.
If that's okay with you.
As long as I get to touch your growing butt too, absolutely.
She pauses and pulls back a little. That seems to have inspired a deep yearning.
Yes. Soon.
Let's eat first and go to bed.
You chuckle a bit, somewhat bewildered.
Okay?
By the time you descend back onto your mat, Siblif has finished eating.
Her tummy is noticeably stuffed.
She's short of breath, softly panting in the aftermath of her feast.
That's a real struggle for you, huh?
Yes...
But I have to do it! Can't get immense on a dainty diet~
She gives her taut belly a gentle slap, sending a subtle ripple through her fat. Her heavy breathing persists.
Your face heats up at the unexpected gesture, and hers is similarly tinted pink.
You're adorable, Siblif.
So eager to gain...
A dumb, warm grin is shared between the two of you, Siblif now rather proudly commenting on her stuffed, soon-to-be-growing tummy.
She evidently really needed to get this desire off her chest.
localState++
It takes a little while to wind down, but eventually you finish eating and Siblif's occasional proclamations cease.
You gently squish and knead your own belly all the while.
Sooner than later, you're asleep once more.
localState++
You want to gain weight. That's apparent, Siblif.
And I don't want to sound like I disapprove - I don't!
But tell me about it, please.
She does a small sigh and braces herself for a second.
Yes, I do.
That's the end for now! Enjoy looking at Siblif if you want. Close the window when you're done.
Kiwi! Wake up!
You jolt awake abruptly, greeted by the noticeably fattened form of Siblif.
localState++
Kiwi, look at my boobs!
You sleepily blink several times.
Huh. They're quite a bit bigger now.
Yeah! They got so... heavy.
She has one cupped in each hand, sloshing them up and down gently.
It prompts you to blush a fair bit. She's doing this right above your bed...
More importantly than that:
That's the effect of the food here? It makes your breasts bigger?
No, it makes you fatter.
Food always does that.
Not without eating a lot more than this! Two meals to gain this much is absurd!
Oh. Right, I guess that's true.
So, you want to gain weight then?
Ah- it's too early for this! Please go get more food first!
Wow.
Alright, fine. But we are going to talk about this later.
You get up as swiftly as you can - not very - and make your way out of the tent.
localState++
Kiwi, look at my belly!
You sleepily blink several times.
Huh. That's a fair bit bigger than yesterday.
Yeah! It's so squishy and round.
She's openly caressing it right in front of your face, giving it little pats and rubs.
It prompts a lot of blushing from you.
More importantly than that:
That's the effect of the food here? It makes your tummy bigger?
Kiwi, look at my hips!
You sleepily blink several times.
Oh, you are looking... squishier.
Yeah! My butt is so round and soft now.
It's so comfortable to sit on!
Although you can't see it since she's facing you, she's clearly squeezing her butt as you converse.
It's surprisingly flustering - she's really into this.
So that's the effect of the food here? It makes your butt area plump up?
You bring the steaming meal in, and give one to Siblif.
Shortly after you sit down, and after the shark has already begun eating, you speak up.
